title: Add FO-07 to overview page
description:
Add FO-07 entry to the overview page.

Files to modify:
- `app/overview/page.tsx`

Add a new entry to the versions array:
{
  id: 'FO-07',
  name: 'Full Onboarding (Card Selection)',
  href: '/fo-07',
  tagline: 'Rate affirmations with thumbs up/down',
  description: 'Same dynamic discovery as FO-04, but with a card-based review system. Rate 20 affirmations with Like/Don\'t Like buttons instead of swiping. No progress bar, pulsing heart transitions.',
  inputType: 'Dynamic AI-generated prompts',
  outputType: 'Card selection (20 cards)',
  highlight: 'Like/Don\'t Like cards',
}

Also add FO-07 row to the comparison table at the bottom:
- Version: FO-07
- User Effort: Medium
- Personalization: High (iterative)
- Learning: None (single review)
- Best For: Deliberate selection

⚠️ Do not close this tick until FO-07 appears on the overview page.
acceptance_criteria: npm run dev succeeds and /overview shows FO-07 card
